sources.title: Caltiki, the Immortal Monster
sources.description: Title: Caltiki, the Immortal Monster Summary: Archaeologists investigating some Mayan ruins come across a blob-like monster. They manage to destroy it with fire, but keep a sample. Meanwhile, a comet is due to pass close to the Earth -... Directed by: Riccardo Freda, Mario Bava Actors: Production Company: Galatea Film Release Date: 20 September 1960 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 Archaeologists investigating some Mayan ruins come across a blob-like monster. They manage to destroy it with fire, but keep a sample. Meanwhile, a comet is due to pass close to the Earth - the same comet passed near the Earth at the time the Mayan civilization mysteriously collapsed. Coincidence?

metadata.Plot: Archaeologists investigating some Mayan ruins come across a blob-like monster. They manage to destroy it with fire, but keep a sample. Meanwhile, a comet is due to pass close to the Earth - the same comet passed near the Earth at the time the Mayan civilization mysteriously collapsed. Coincidence?
